top_comments.comment: Amazingly amazing! How simple yet scientific, how spiritual yet rational answers were..!! Very profound...!! Thank you!

In Hindu culture, seeking existential truths is the basis ; here it is full of  debates and discussions ; even the realised Spiritual Masters in this culture could only be a guide post  and it is for the spiritual aspirant to walk alone, throwing away all the crutches and realise existential truths for himself, by himself, unless such a one was already an highly exhalted soul needing just a nudge from his Master to reach his goal or becoming one without a second !
What a bunch of bullshit! Passing bullshit as divine knowledge and science!
